LanguageData.AttackRepelled.stages.attack_repelled.de: We have defended ourselves against hostile incursions.
LanguageData.AttackRepelled_Bloodlust.stages.attack_r: We have demonstrated our power against hostile incursions. Let's hope we don't have to see them again.
LanguageData.AttackRepelled_Pacifist.stages.attack_re: I don't agree with solving problems using violence, but good grief, it is finally over.
LanguageData.NoQuarterGiven.stages.no_quarter_given.d: We have defended ourselves against hostile incursions, but we gave them no quarter.
LanguageData.NoQuarterGiven_Bloodlust.stages.no_quart: We have demonstrated our absolute might against hostile incursions. May them cower from the very sight of our presence!
LanguageData.NoQuarterGiven_Pacifist.stages.no_quarte: I don't agree with solving problems using violence, and honestly, this has gone too far.
LanguageData.NoQuarterGiven_Psychopath.stages.no_quar: We have defended ourselves against hostile incursions, and we gave them no quarter.
